Find out more about our sponsors

Where to stay

Our appointed accommodation agency, Conference Care Ltd., has secured preferential rates with many hotels in Birmingham for our delegates. AoC Create does not take any payment for accommodation, nor will we invoice you - all payments must be made directly with your hotel.

Please see details for the hotels in Birmingham below.

If you have any queries regarding accommodation, please telephone Conference Careâ€™s helpline on 02476369726. When calling, please state that you are attending the AoC Annual Conference and Exhibition 2016.

NB, Hotel rooms and prices are subject to availability. Please ensure you book your hotel through Conference Care to obtain the preferential rates.
